docs.title: New Features
docs.text:
• A new tag management feature has been added to the VAR view, allowing users to monitor tag usage and manage tags in batches;
  • Added GooCloud Online Docs, which is currently only available to VAR & ORG users.

docs.title: Feature Enhancements
docs.text:
• Optimized the Ping/Trace function and added a new function entry in the Command action group of the Device List;
  • Dashboard map display optimization;
  • For individual users, we have decided to disable the Setting Template feature, which is only available for VAR/ORG;

docs.title: Defects Fixed
docs.text: • Fixed the bug that users would display The device is bound by xxx on 0-0-0 0:0 in the router admin panel. Now you will see the exact device binding time.

docs.title: Security Updates
docs.text: • Optimized permission control of Notification logs in the Organization view to prevent unauthorized situations.

docs.title: Known Issues
docs.text: • Fixed the issue that the actual online/offline status of some devices does not match the status of the devices displayed on the GoodCloud; If the above issue occurs in your device, please actively contact us.

docs.title: Additional Information
docs.text: • Please contact our support team (b2bsupport@gl-inet.com) for more information.
